mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE( "id", "work_plan_id", "slot", "maximum", "num" ) VALUES( NEXT VALUE FOR HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE_SEQUENCE, ${workPlanId}, ${slot}, ${maximum}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT s."id" AS "id", s."slot" AS "slot", s."maximum" AS "maximum", s."num" AS "num", TO_CHAR(p."date", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "date" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN p JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE s ON p."id" = s."work_plan_id" WHERE s."work_plan_id" = ${workPlanId}

SELECT p."id" AS "workPlanId", d."id" AS "doctorId", d."name" AS "doctorName", s."slot" AS "slot", s."maximum" AS "maximum" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN p JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE s ON s."work_plan_id" = p."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON p."doctor_id" = d."id" WHERE p."date" = TO_DATE('${date}') AND p."dept_sub_id" = ${deptSubId} ORDER BY d."id", s."slot"

SELECT p."doctor_id" AS "doctorId", s."id" AS "scheduleId", s."slot" AS "slot", s."maximum" AS "maximum", s."num" AS "num" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN p JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE s ON s."work_plan_id" = p."id" WHERE p."id" = ${workPlanId}

SELECT SUM("num") FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE WHERE "id" IN
${one}
